about_the_game:
Rush through deadly dungeons, build massive structures, hurl balls towards hoops and goals. All alongside hundreds or even thousands of people in the same concurrent map. Edison lets you experience a constantly changing and evolving universe of game genres.



The same way a concert changes how you experience music, Edison intensifies the feeling of live gaming by inserting thousands of others playing simultaneously into the same location. Imagine the feeling of being in first place with 1000 people closely following behind you on the race track. Or the satisfaction of sinking a basketball shot from behind a giant crowd that is getting airballs.



Edison isn’t just thrilling to play—it's also incredibly entertaining to stream or watch. The fast-paced action, user-generated chaos, and the sheer number of players involved make each game session unpredictable and fun to follow. Viewers can watch epic competitions unfold, unexpected victories, or hilarious moments as players race, build, and battle in real-time. If you're a streamer you don't have to have thousands of people watch you play on a stream, you can invite them to join you in the game.

  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 or AMD Radeon R5

  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470 and above

short_description: Edison redefines gaming with more players in one space than ever. It's not just multiplayer; we support thousands of concurrent players, creating new game formats. Discover a universe of casual games, like platformers, treasure hunts, and sports all revolutionized by massive multiplayer interaction.
